verbose_text: Ezetimibe, and more importantly its active metabolite ezetimibe glucuronide, binds to the Niemann-Pick C1-like-1 receptor at the jejunal epithelial cell brush border, preventing formation of the clathrin coated vesicles which allow endocytosis of the cholesterol Niemann-Pick C1-like-1 receptor complex.
evidence: Ezetimibe, and more importantly its active metabolite ezetimibe glucuronide, binds to the Niemann-Pick C1-like-1 receptor
